title: Part C - Control Treatment
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without enzyme
    Description: Confirms enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction with denatured enzyme
    Description: Confirms active enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction under anaerobic conditions (no oxygen)
    Description: Confirms oxygen is necessary.

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without catechol
    Description: Confirms catechol is necessary
descriptions:
Student earns none of the following points.

2 points maximum

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without enzyme
    Description: Confirms enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction with denatured enzyme
    Description: Confirms active enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction under anaerobic conditions (no oxygen)
    Description: Confirms oxygen is necessary.

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without catechol
    Description: Confirms catechol is necessary

Student earns one of the following points.

2 points maximum

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without enzyme
    Description: Confirms enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction with denatured enzyme
    Description: Confirms active enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction under anaerobic conditions (no oxygen)
    Description: Confirms oxygen is necessary.

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without catechol
    Description: Confirms catechol is necessary

Student earns two of the following points.

2 points maximum

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without enzyme
    Description: Confirms enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction with denatured enzyme
    Description: Confirms active enzyme is necessary

  • Control Treatment: Reaction under anaerobic conditions (no oxygen)
    Description: Confirms oxygen is necessary.

  • Control Treatment: Reaction without catechol
    Description: Confirms catechol is necessary
